name: MKUserTrackingBarButtonItem
desc: A specialized bar button item that allows the user to toggle if the map tracks to the heading the user is facing.

items.name: init(mapView: MKMapView?)
items.desc: Initializes a newly created bar button item with the specified map view.

items.name: var mapView: MKMapView?
items.desc: The map view associated with this bar button item.
